response:
Yoga poses and asanas can improve the natural glow of your skin and make you look beautiful and younger. We do not realize but most of our skin problems often could be due to stress, no-exercise and various other imbalances in our body. Yoga, coupled with some beauty products would lead to a beautiful skin that radiates from within.
Which one would you prefer next, tips for a good hygiene, or, continue with skin hacks?
